name: HOUSE SURVEY
description:
You are an inspector and you had to find proof in 3 minute to identify the suspect among 5 suspect !

minimal :

  • Intel core i5 or AMD A8 (3.0 Ghz)
  • Intel HD graphique or Radeon HD (750Mo)
  • 8go RAM
  • 1 go Memory .

Best :

  • Intel core i5 or AMD A10 (3.5 Ghz)
  • Nvidia GTX 750 Ti or Radeon R7 250 (2 Go)
  • 16go RAM
  • 1 go Memory.
BUTTONFUNCTIONW A S D (or Z Q S D)MoveMouseLookLeft clickshoot (or nothing)ShiftRunspacejump

( You can change this in the unity start menu )
